sfm.configuration.title: Super Furnace Mod Configs
sfm.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_1: Super Blast Furnace, A special structure for highly efficient ore smelting
sfm.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_3: Layer 2, Surround the blast furnace with iron blocks
sfm.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_4: Place a blast furnace in the center
sfm.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_5: Layer 3, 3x3 block of iron top cover
sfm.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_6: Compared to a regular blast furnace, the Super Blast Furnace is far more efficient
sfm.ponder.super_furnace.text_1: Super Furnace, A special structure that greatly improves smelting efficiency
sfm.ponder.super_furnace.text_3: Build Layer 2, Note the center position
sfm.ponder.super_furnace.text_4: Place a furnace in the center
sfm.ponder.super_furnace.text_6: Done! The Super Furnace significantly boosts smelting speed
sfm.ponder.super_smoker.text_1: Super Smoker, A special structure for quickly smoking food
sfm.ponder.super_smoker.text_2: Layer 1, Alternate coal blocks and logs in a cross pattern
sfm.ponder.super_smoker.text_3: Layer 2, Keep the cross pattern, place a smoker in the center
sfm.ponder.super_smoker.text_4: Place a smoker in the center
sfm.ponder.super_smoker.text_6: Done! The Super Smoker greatly increases food smoking speed
sfm.ponder.tag.furnaces.description: Construction guides for high-efficiency smelting setups
